description: The trap will be generated when the connection gets established successfully with diameter authentication server

event.Summary: Connection established successfully with $v1 diameter authentication server

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthSrvrEstTrap AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerType i 2 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerAddr s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginHostType i 0 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginHostAddr s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerPort u 9999 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginRealm s EXAMPLE

description: Address type of diameter authentication server.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerType

description: The authentication port of the diameter authentication sever
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerPort

description: The realm of the origin host.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginRealm

description: The trap will be generated when the diameter authentication server goes down
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthSrvrDownTrap AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerType i 1 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerAddr s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginHostType i 0 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginHostAddr s EXAMPLE AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerPort u 9999 AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginRealm s EXAMPLE

description: Address type of diameter authentication server.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerType

description: The authentication port of the diameter authentication sever
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthServerPort

description: The realm of the origin host.
variables.name: AP-DIAMETERAUTH-MIB::apDiamAuthOriginRealm
